title: FF_D4E Function Block
description:
FINDB searched for the presence of STR2 in STR1 and returns
the last position of STR2 in STR1.
If STR2 is not found, a 0 is returned.
name: FF_D4E

input.name: D0
input.description: Input boolean signal that sets output Q0.

input.name: D1
input.description: Input boolean signal that sets output Q1.

input.name: D2
input.description: Input boolean signal that sets output Q2.

input.name: D3
input.description: Input boolean signal that sets output Q3.

input.name: CLK
input.description: Clock signal that triggers the setting of outputs.

input.name: RST
input.description: Reset signal that clears all outputs.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output boolean signal representing the state set by D0.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output boolean signal representing the state set by D1.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output boolean signal representing the state set by D2.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output boolean signal representing the state set by D3.
